entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
